meta.lens_feel: 24mm wide, slight wide-angle realism without face distortion
meta.quality: ultra-photorealistic, looks like a real iPhone camera roll photo
texture_rules: tiny handheld imperfections (micro-tilt, not perfectly centered)

scene.location: modern hotel-suite / upscale apartment living room
key_background_elements: large floor-to-ceiling dark charcoal curtains on the left side
warm textured plaster wall on the right side (brown/tan, slightly mottled)
soft warm light gradient on the wall (like a hidden lamp or sconce spill)
foreground: large beige fabric sectional sofa with visible woven texture
seat cushions slightly creased from weight (real compression, not perfect)
bottom-right corner hint of a speckled stone/marble tabletop edge (out of focus)
extra_realism_details: a few personal items/bags faintly visible in the back-right area (messy-but-real, not staged)
dim room depth, corners fall into shadow naturally

sources: soft warm lamp spill from camera-right creating a golden cast on skin and wall
darker fill from the curtain side (camera-left) for contrast
look: gentle highlights on shoulders, chest, thighs
soft but noticeable shadows under legs and along couch seams

skin.tone: light warm-fair beige with a golden indoor cast
skin.finish: natural, slight sheen on shoulders and legs, visible pores/real texture

face.structure: soft pretty features, small nose, full lips, delicate jawline
face.expression: calm, slightly dreamy/relaxed, eyes looking down to her right (not at camera)
face.makeup: minimal glam: even skin, subtle blush, natural brows, soft lip tint (not bold)

hair.style: straight with a loose natural fall, center/soft-middle part, a few face-framing strands

body.type: slim-curvy hourglass (fit waist, rounded hips, very full bust but still natural)
body.waist: tight and visibly cinched from seated twist and posture
body.legs: long, smooth, slightly glossy highlights from warm light
body.chest: very full and more prominent than before, lifted cleavage from posture and fabric tension, realistic weight and shape (not cartoonish)

grooming_details.armpits: visible because both arms are raised; smooth/clean look
grooming_details.fingernails: short-to-medium length, glossy pale pink/nude manicure
grooming_details.toenails: classic French tip pedicure (clean white tips, natural pink base, glossy finish)
grooming_details.accessory: thin delicate anklet on the left ankle

top.type: deep-plunge sleeveless halter-style bodysuit or draped knit top
top.material: soft drapey fabric that catches warm light, slight sheen
fit_rules: open sides / low armholes that reveal side torso
fabric tension/creases where it pulls at the waist and chest (realistic stretch, slightly stronger tension due to fuller bust)

bottom.type: very short denim shorts (light blue wash)
bottom.fit: snug on hips, subtle wrinkles at the lap/waist from sitting

outfit.feet: barefoot on the couch cushions (natural toe spread, relaxed), French tip pedicure visible when toes catch the warm light

exact_pose_match: one leg folded under her (tucked), the other knee raised high toward her chest
raised knee is closest to camera, creating a strong thigh line and depth
both arms lifted behind her head, hands interlaced or resting in hair
elbows out wide, shoulders open, armpits naturally visible
torso slightly twisted, emphasizing waist curve
head turned down and to her right, relaxed neck line
micro_motion: a tiny arch in the back from the arms-behind-head stretch
subtle compression of thigh and hip against the cushion
loose strands of blonde hair resting near cheeks

camera_composition.framing: vertical 9:16, subject low-mid frame with lots of negative space above
camera_composition.angle: slightly low/straight-on from the front (as if a friend shot it while seated/standing nearby)
camera_composition.focus: sharp on her face + front thigh, background slightly softer but still readable
realism_notes: iPhone-style HDR but restrained (no crunchy oversharpening)

negative_prompt: no excessive symmetry or studio perfection
no explicit nudity or pornographic framing
